pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 16, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Singapore

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Adam Road Food Centre.

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity             

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea.

Closed to media.

Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Port Moresby.

Port Moresby Jacksons International Airport

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
